page.title: 13EARDISLEY COUNTRY CHILDREN
page.content: I usually get up about 7.00,get dressed and have my breakfast.I like Oat Krunchies and toast.Sometimes at the weekend I go out to my Nan and Grandads,they live about 8miles away. Sometimes my Mum rides her{horse}it is a chestnut,I have a ride too.Dad goes {shooting,}my brother and I go too sometimes.We go to a friends farm,it has long grass.The dog goes in front to sniff out the{pheasants}we are not allowed to go in front of the guns.We do the beating to raise the peasants. My brother likes to help Dad work on the car.He has a garden of his own. I get up at 7.45,get dressed and have breakfast.I help Mum feed the cats.Mum has 8 horses and ponies.She breaks them in.I help her catch them.Then I go riding around the lanes and fields.In the holidays I go to{Pony {Club.}We learn to do races and jump.
